featured.text: In the health food stores of major cities, it is now possible to buy tofu burgers and even tofu hot dogs.

She opened her first store two years ago; now she has fifty stores all over the country.
Posters of the local rock band were displayed in store windows to promote the sale of their _____ tickets.

other.text: Daphne said that her dream for the future is to see ivory banned, all stored ivory destroyed and no one wearing an ivory ornament ever again.

With a large memory card to store pictures, you can shoot and shoot and never have to worry about changing a roll.

definition.en_def: A place where goods are sold; to keep or accumulate something for future use.
definition.example: I need to go to the store to buy some groceries.
